original_text: We continued our voyage from Tyre and landed at Ptolemais, where we greeted the brothers and sisters and stayed with them for a day.
korean_text: 두로를 떠나 항해를 다 마치고 돌레마이에 이르러 형제들에게 안부를 묻고 그들과 함께 하루를 있다가

sentences.original_text: We continued our voyage from Tyre
where we greeted the brothers and sisters
and stayed with them for a day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하루 동안 그들과 함께 머물렀습니다
